label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_030
content:
## 2024-09-23 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 108
- Active: 95
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 68
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 13

### Enrollment by Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 35
- Standard: 35
- Placebo: 38

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 4.4
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.1
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 21.0
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 8.5
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 381.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 44.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 27.1
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.6
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.8
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 1.5
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.5

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.6
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.9
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 39.7
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 11.2
- Standard Six MWT (meters) Mean: 322.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) SD: 31.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 22.5
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.4
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.7
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.3
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.1
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.7

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.1
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.1
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 46.8
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 8.2
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) Mean: 263.0
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) SD: 34.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 20.5
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.5
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.2
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.5
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.2
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.3

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 207
- Sessions Attended: 178
- Attendance Rate (%): 87.3

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 12.9
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.0
- WBC (k) Mean: 6.9
- WBC (k) SD: 1.4
- Platelets (k) Mean: 252
- Platelets (k) SD: 42
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 0.97
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.15
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 108.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 17.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 18.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 6.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-3013, Description: insomnia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-3069, Description: diaphoresis, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-3031, Description: Missed physical therapy session, not rescheduled within window, Severity: minor
- PD ID: PM-PD-3041, Description: Sleep diary not returned by subject, Severity: minor

### Events
- Blinded interim efficacy data compiled for DSMB
- Functional assessment battery completed for 24 subjects this week
- Pain diary electronic collection rate: 94%

### Notes
- Week 30: Pain management assessments on track. 108 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
